programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: In Deep Doo-Doo // Rev's Tree Party
programme.desc: When Rev asks to help beautify the town, he insists there's no job too tough! That is...until he finds out he'll be hauling stinky manure. Rev tries to pawn the job off, until Avery tells him the best way to get it done is to just... "doo-doo" it! // When the gang organizes a birthday party for Rev, Avery insists they keep it secret. After hiding Rev's gifts in a tree, they realize the presents are stuck up there and will need to be retrieved-all before Rev figures out what's going on!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Driving Miss Dottie // Follow the Bouncing Wrecking Ball
programme.desc: When Miss Dottie goes missing, Rev and Avery offer to return her to the Rancher's Jamboree! Rumble is star-struck by the show-sheep, until the unlikely duo become friends. Back safe, Miss Dottie takes the stage, this time with her new pal Rumble! // Rev is determined to master Rumble's new wrecking-ball attachment, but things quickly get out of hand when the duo refuse to ask for help. Now they'll need all the help they can get to stop the wayward ball from wrecking all of Fender Bend!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and the gang are painting a mural for Four-Wheeled Friendship Day! But with Avery in charge, the friends start to lose confidence in their work. She may be a master when it comes to art, but Avery has a lot to learn about being project leader! // When the pals befriend a mouse in the barn, Rumble can't resist breaking the rules by bringing the little guy a snack. Before long there are mice everywhere! Rev and Rumble will need to shoo away their tiny guests, before Mom and Dad find them!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Puppy Love // Fair Weather Ferry // Bumper Ball // Vroom with a View
programme.desc: Rev and Rumble are supposed to spend the day together, but Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy instead, making Rumble jealous. // Rev learns that "old dogs" make great teachers, but even "old dogs" can learn new tricks from young...

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Gear Up Garage Band // First Aid Fun
programme.desc: At band practice, Rumble struggles to control his nervous backfiring, even damaging the instruments by accident! Determined not to give up on the festival, the gang improvises and uses makeshift instruments. They even feature Rumble's nervous twitch! // When Rev and Owen begrudgingly agree to join Bo's First Aid Games, they do everything BUT take the lessons seriously. It isn't long before the boys find out that first aid isn't all fun and games, but it IS totally awesome!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Bo to the Rescue // Ice Cream Team
programme.desc: When Bo messes up on a few rescue missions, he decides to quit Bo's Rescue Hotline. Wanting to help their friend, the gang creates fake emergencies for Bo to solve. But as the friends find out, it takes more than trickery to build self-confidence! // As a heatwave hits Fender Bend, Rev and his friends look forward to Ice Cream Dream Day! But when the ice cream truck breaks down, it's up to the gang to find a way to deliver the tasty treats before they all melt.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev, Rumble and their friends help capture a group of wayward llamas, they each try and claim sole credit for the round up. Rev's parents listen patiently to the elaborate tales, each one starring a different hero, before ruling it a team effort! // When Avery creates a magnetic modification for Rumble, it seems to be the perfect solution. Now Rumble can help them tidy up the Gear Up Garage! But things get complicated when Rumble turns into a super-magnet, attracting all kinds of metal debris!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Fender Bend Friend Day // The Rev & Rumble Fan Club
programme.desc: Rev wants to surprise his friends with a movie celebrating their friendship, so he secretly gathers footage to show they're the best friends ever. When Avery realizes what he's up to, she adds her own clips to the movie - surprising Rev as well! // Owen hosts a virtual review of the gang's adventures with Rev and Rumble, plus all of their awesome gear! He walks his viewers through some of their most memorable moments, from mega stunts to monsters to rescue missions.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After many years of working hard on Accelerator Acres, Tilly the tractor is ready to retire from ranch life. Rev wants to find her the perfect new job, but his ideas are too intense for old Tilly. He'll have to adjust to her slower pace first. // Rev and the gang compete for the title of Best Prankster-except Lori sits out, claiming pranks aren't her thing. After a full day of pranks and laughs, the kids gather for the big party that Lori planned for them...but all is not as it seems!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Green Phantom // Over Easy Does It
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Winter Bestival // The Mystery of Missing Trees
programme.desc: After a snowstorm, Rev and Avery compete for title of Champion of the Winter Bestival! Avery is determined to hold her title from last year. Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Play with Cocobi
programme.desc: Color play, dance, and more. Let's have fun with Cocobi!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: Baby Riki
programme.desc: The show covers all aspects of a child's life from physical well-being to cognitive and soft skills. The musical stories are based around age-appropriate experiences with educational concepts introduced in familiar surroundings and context for infants.

programme.title: Berry and Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, the little snail boy and Dolly, the ladybird are best friends. Together they discover the world around them, while they make new friends with Balthazar the bee, Flutter the butterfly, Stanley the stag-beetle, Leapy the grasshopper, and many others.

programme.title: Doby & Disy: Exploring Journey
programme.desc: Adorable twin brother and sister, Doby & Disy, go on adventures in the magic forest together with their friends. They learn different colors, figures, songs and communication skills by solving various problems on the way.

programme.title: Stella And Sam
programme.desc: As they explore the world in all its seasons, Stella and Sam have wild adventures and comical mishaps. They make friends and discover many things - especially about themselves. If Sam is bold enough to rescue Fred from the sprinkler, then maybe he really can be brave enough to have a sleepover in the backyard tent. Every day is a new adventure, and Stella and Sam share the joy of discovering that they have what it takes to face the biggest adventure of all... growing up.

programme.title: Kids Planet
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed.

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, to help them discover a vast and captivating world, fight their fears and inhibitions, and learn important family values.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Robocar POLI - Try not to hurry & I want to be praised.: School B is late and he is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for the short cut. However every roads are blocked because of roadwork.

programme.title: Jenny's Magic Shop
programme.desc: Jenny and her best friend Blam the Teddy Bear run a magic shop in the town of Dreamville, where everybody can come for magical help. The residents of Dreamville always leave the shop thanking Jenny, but actually, they set the stage for their own miracles, leaving behind in the shop whatever is keeping them from living life and making decisions. After all, the ability to change yourself is the truest form of magic. Jenny and Blam never refuse to help anyone, but it often happens that they're the ones who need help, since Jenny's still a kid and Blam's an eccentric teddy bear.

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them!

programme.title: Back to Back
programme.desc: Embark on an electrifying journey as they boldly leap from one heart-pounding expedition to the next, fueled by their unbreakable bond and insatiable thirst for excitement. Get ready to be swept away in a whirlwind of adrenaline-pumping quests, where danger and discovery await them at every turn.

programme.title: Back to Classics
programme.desc: These are all the fun Nursery Rhymes like The Animal Fair, One Two Buckle my Shoe for your babies!

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: This special collection includes Five Little Buses, Johny Johny Yes Papa and more fun melodies.

programme.title: Bedtime Lullabies
programme.desc: Here's a collection of gentle melodies featuring Little Boy Blue, Let's go to sleep, and many more.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Gentle songs to help kids sleep peacefully with calm tunes and soothing rhythms.

programme.title: Soothing Melodies
programme.desc: Step into a world of Soothing Melodies like Hey Diddle Diddle, Hush Little Baby, and more!

Biggie D, Fleming, and Tibbs race out to find out what happened with the missing truck. Quickly they discover the evil Keeter Reebus is behind it and they have to locate the missing shipment before time runs out / Klaus tells Shaq that he needs maintenance to get out of volunteering on the first day of the Boys and Girls Club Rolling Wood Derby so he can race Niccolo Tessio. After winning, he thinks he's in the clear and can make the derby the next day. When Niccolo challenges him to yet another race, Klaus has to decided what's more important: beating Niccolo or fulfilling his promise to Shaq.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage

After filling up Queenie's loader, everyone heads to the dump a storm bursts overhead. When lighting strikes the trash, it unleashes a monster that leaves Himari alone to defeat / Prince Jaffa arrives in Orlanta from Kinshasa, Africa for an official visit and stays at Shaq's house. Despite strict orders by Prince Jaffa's chaperone to not leave the garage after a long day of Princely duties, Himari convinces Prince Jaffa to sneak out with her and Fleming to experience what it's like being a normal teenager.

programme.desc: Super Mario Bros 3 - Princess Toadstool for President: When Princess Toadstool challenges Koopa to an election over leadership of the Mushroom Kingdom, Kooky uses a nice guy potion on Koopa to make all the voters like him. / King Koopa and his Koopalings decide to surrender to Princess Toadstool and gives the key to Castle Koopa which the Princess and Mario decide to check the place.

programme.title: Super Mario Bros 3
programme.desc: Super Mario Bros 3 - Dadzilla / Tag Team Trouble: Fed up with Koopa's ways, Kootie Pie and Big Mouth bring a Hollywood movie monster to life and convince him he's their real dad. / After Toad fell asleep and a bag of coins have been taken, thinking Koopa has taken it, Toad gets his cousins to wrestle which King Koopa and Cheatsy's Sledge Brothers are also entering to win 1 million gold coins.

programme.title: Street Sharks
programme.desc: Street Sharks - Sharkbait: Dr. Bolton created a gene-slammer for peace, but Dr. Paradigm used it for evil. Bolton intervened and was transformed into a creature. His sons John, Clint, Robert, and Coop were mutated into sharks. Now, they must adapt while avoiding discovery.

programme.title: Atomic Betty
programme.desc: Atomic Betty - The Really Big Game: On Earth, Betty and her dad compete in a fishing derby with Penelope and her father. In space DeGill has been captured by his old nemesis, the big game hunter Pontifadora the Conquistadora. Betty must help DeGill in time to return to the derby. / On Earth, Betty has new substitute teacher in her art class, while in space, Sparky and X-5 have gone missing. Betty scours the galaxy, and when she finds them, they seem different. Betty soon discovers they are actually Minimus and a Blood Monk in disguise. Now Betty must free her friends, who have been captured by Maximus and return to Earth before her art class ends.

programme.title: Atomic Betty
programme.desc: Atomic Betty - Self Sabotage / Crass Menagerie: On Earth, Betty and her friends are running a long distance course for gym class when Betty is called for a mission. In space, Betty arrives on her ship to discover that Sparky has dismantled it and X-5 for annual tune-ups. Sparky must quickly put everything back together again, which he does, just not correctly. Betty and her crew must managed with their mixed up ship to stop Maximus' latest scheme and return to Earth in time for Betty to finish the race./ Betty is the toast of the galaxy and is letting all the admiration go to her head, while Sparky and X-5 feel left out. When Maximus captures Betty, she becomes the newest addition to his menagerie, a collection of rare beings and objects from around the galaxy, and Betty must rely on her recently scorned friends to rescue her.

programme.title: Fright Knight
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds The Book of Fear. It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her knighmarish power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest as they fight off the Whipperella that they we find out Aaron's true fear the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik captures a flute-playing Ninja crane, taps his martial arts knowledge, and transfers it to Scratch and Grounder.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Scratch and Grounder fiddle with Robotnik's Warpinating Warpifier and send Sonic and Tails into the world of a Mobius Fairy Tales book.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails find an underground world of diamonds, but they are held captive there by a miserly Mole-Troll. When Robotnik comes to capture them, he accidently frees them from the Mole-Troll, who teams up with Sonic and Tails to defend his riches.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic saves a damsel in distress, and falls in love with her, not knowing she's a robot built by Robotnik. But when she has a chance to trap him, she helps him escape, realizing she has fallen for him.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Scratch and Grounder use Robotnik's new Slo-Mo Ray Gun to capture Sonic, Tails rescues him by reversing the gun and turning it on a tribe of friendly Tree Sloth People who become a high speed commando strike force against Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Tails and other Mobius citizens are lured into Robotnik's robotic games of chance, and when they lose they're sent to slave labor camps. Sonic rescues Tails and the others by beating the house in games of chance at Robotnik's Casino.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: In order to free Sketch Lampoon (a satirical comic book artist) from Robotnik's new high security prison, Sonic allows himself to be captured, then makes a high speed rescue and escape.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Tails gets trapped in the "Warp of Confusion" (an Escher-like world of another dimension) by Robotnik's cousin, Dr. Warpnik, Sonic comes to the rescue and traps Robotnik and his badniks in the warp.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik's momma escapes from the home for mothers of villains and demands her birthday present! When she endangers Sonic and Tails, and they manage to have her taken back to the home, even Robotnik is glad to see her go.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Coconuts is exiled by Robotnik to a remote jungle, where he uses a giant baby ape to destroy villages. But Sonic exposes Coconuts as a robot, and the baby ape's real Dad takes Coconuts and the baby ape away for a spanking.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Outraged by a new hit song written about Sonic, Robotnik outlaws music on Mobius then takes pop star, Catty Carlisle captive. With his MD (Music Destroyer) Robot, Robotnik terrorizes the music loving Mobius population till Sonic rescues Catty.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: A fast talking, travelling salesman named Wes Weasley sells Robotnik various hedgehog-catching gadgets, including the Darkenator, the Super-duper Gravity Stopper, and the De-Atomizer.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When Pronto accidentally uses the Emperor's sword blaster, he can suddenly do no wrong. Lady Dai-Fu manipulates Underlord Holt into trapping the Shane Gang with a new superweapon: the Iron Warrior!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Emperor has returned! After the Shane Gang failed to defeat the Iron Warrior, the Emperor sets to work creating even more Unstoppable Warriors to reclaim the Eastern Caverns. The Shane Gang search for a way to defeat the new creations, but when the Emperor places a bounty on Junjie's head, they also have to deal with the Dai-Fu and hordes of the Emperor's Underlords.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang return home to the 99 caverns to find Gateway Cavern overrun with slugs-in Eli's absence, the Shadow Clan have governed by putting the slugs before the people, and the result is chaos! It's up to Eli to restore the balance, but the Shadow Clan aren't as friendly as they once were...and that's saying something. Help comes from an unexpected source-Tad and his slug Pieper, who just arrived from the Surface!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang take Tad under their wing, training him to blast like a pro with Eli's old blaster and teaching him to live by the slugslinger's code. Tad takes to it like a natural, and as Kord says, it looks like they have another "slugslinging savant from the Surface" on their hands. But their training will be put to the test when Tad accompanies them to a showdown with the Scrap Force...and the Shadow Clan!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad is still missing after the slug-out with the Shadow Clan, but the Gang have to set off without him when reports start coming in of slugs disappearing all across the 99 caverns. As they pursue the trail of missing slugs, the mystery grows darker when it leads them straight to Dr. Blakk's old stronghold!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad's hypnotic slug Pieper has gone megamorph, his gang of supporters all have Gattler blasters, and Tad's control over his army of ghouls is stronger than Dr. Blakk's ever was. The Shane Gang are under non-stop ghoul fire as they struggle to put a stop to Tad's plans and end the mass ghouling of slugs once and for all.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The World Beneath Our Feet Pt 2
programme.desc: Now its Eli's turn to be Slugterra's next Shane, whether he's ready or not! Unfortunately, the slugslinging tournament he enters to prove that he's ready, pretty quickly shows that he's not!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The World Beneath Our Feet Pt 1
programme.desc: 15-year-old Eli Shane is a regular kid except for one thing: he comes from a long line of Shanes, each who has journied from the surface to protect Slugterra and the slugs that make the world special.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.sub-title: The World Beneath Our Feet Pt 2
programme.desc: Now its Eli's turn to be Slugterra's next Shane, whether he's ready or not! Unfortunately, the slugslinging tournament he enters to prove that he's ready, pretty quickly shows that he's not!

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The gang signs up for a weekend camp that promises to teach your slugs tons of new moves - without lifting a finger!

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Popa Chubby
programme.sub-title: Popa Chubby - It's A Mighty Hard Road
programme.desc: Popa Chubby, born as Ted Horowitz, is an American blues singer and guitarist, who has become one of the most popular figures of New York's blues scene. Early on in his career he released the album 'Booty and the Beast' (1995), which became one of the 1990s's best-selling blues albums. Chubby describes his own style as "The Stooges meets Buddy Guy, Motrhead meets Muddy Waters, and Jimi Hendrix meets Robert Johnson". As part of the French music festival Blues sur Seine, Chubby and his band played a great blues rock concert, showcasing the artist's powerful and soulful guitar playing. This performance was recorded at Thtre Simone Signoret on November 8, 2019.

programme.title: Thelonious Monk
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Buddy Rich, Tom Warrington, Bob Kaye & John Marshall
programme.sub-title: Buddy Rich Big Band - The North Sea Jazz
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festival's staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Buddy Rich, one of the most influential jazz drummers of all time, performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival of 1978 with his orchestra. Rich's drumming was known for its remarkable speed and dexterity, which he achieved without any formal education.

programme.title: John Scofield
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festival's staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1986, multi-talented American guitarist John Scofield and his band performed an electrifying concert at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. First known for playing with Miles Davis, Scofield shows here that he earned that pedigree.

programme.title: Dizzy Gillespie
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Christian Scott, Lawrence Fields, Braxton Cook & Kris Funn
programme.desc: In just a few years, young trumpet player Christian Scott has become synonymous with a new jazz generation. He shakes up the conventions of jazz by taking the genre to new horizons and reaching a wider audience. No doubt, at 33 years old, Christian Scott is already forging his own path. After each record release, he seems even more determined to challenge the rules of jazz with his own avant-garde style. At his 2018 show at La Cooprative de Mai, Christian Scott celebrates 100 years of jazz with the program The Centennial Trilogy. Expect a unique performance in an intimate theatre setting, shot in native 4K!

programme.title: Coleman Hawkins
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Omar Sosa, Childo Tomas, Ernesto Simpson & Leandro Saint-Hill
programme.desc: While always keeping one foot firmly anchored in the traditions of his home country, Cuba, Omar Sosa tirelessly explores music from the Caribbean to India, and West Africa to the Arab world. Since he left Cuba in 1993, the pianist has been blending his Afro-Cuban roots with jazz, hip hop, electro and world music. For his 2018 performance at Thtre de Villefranche-sur-Sane, he brings to stage his Quarteto Afrocubano members Childo Tomas (electric bass & vocals), Ernesto Simpson (drums), and Leandro Saint-Hill (saxophones, flute, percussion & vocals). Together, they create a riveting instrumental dialogue. Celebrating rhythm in all its forms, this Omar Sosa concert is an intense and mystical experience.

programme.title: Martha Argerich
programme.desc: Cinematic classical clips and energizing concert pieces featuring up-and-coming artists.

programme.title: Les Dissonances
programme.sub-title: Mozart - String Quartet No. 19 in C major, K. 465
programme.desc: Les Dissonances is a collective of artists founded by violinist David Grimal in 2004. The conductorless ensemble consists of musicians from the most prestigious European orchestras, international soloists, and young talents. In this performance, Les Dissonances' string quartet consisting of David Grimal (violin), Hans Peter Hofmann (violin), David Gaillard (viola), and Xavier Phillips (cello) performs Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart's String Quartet No. 19 in C major, K. 465, Dissonance' (Op. 10 No. 6). The String Quartet is the last in the set of six quartets that were dedicated to Joseph Haydn. Written between 1782 and 1785, these are also known as the Haydn Quartets (Op. 10). String Quartet No. 19 is remarkable for its slow, dissonant introduction, giving the piece its nickname. This ominous passage suddenly gives way to the bright Allegro in C major. This performance was recorded at Opra Comique in Paris, France, in 2015.

programme.title: David Bateson, Tuva Semmingsen, Cassandra Lemoine & Bjrn Fjstad
programme.sub-title: Fantasymphony A Concert of Fire and Magic
programme.desc: The Danish National Symphony Orchestra once again opens the gates to magical worlds with an enchanting concert program. Under the baton of German conductor Christian Schumann, the Danish National Symphony Orchestra, Danish National Concert Choir, and Danish National Junior Choir team up to perform music from the most popular fantasy movies, TV series and video games, including The Lord of The Rings, Game of Thrones, The Hobbit, The Witcher, and League of Legends. Featured soloists in this concert are Norwegian mezzo-soprano Tuva Semmingsen, Canadian-Portuguese soprano Cassandra Lemoine, Danish musician Bjrn Fjstad, and British actor David Bateson. This performance was recorded at the DR Koncerthuset in Copenhagen, Denmark, in April 2023.

programme.title: Luk Vondrek, Michael Tilson Thomas & London Symphony Orchestra
programme.sub-title: Liszt's Concerto No. 1 & Mahler's Symphony No. 5
programme.desc: American Conductor Laureate' Michael Tilson Thomas leads the London Symphony Orchestra in a program of romantic masterworks. The concert opens with Franz Liszt's Piano Concerto No. 1, featuring the brilliant Czech pianist Luk Vondrek as soloist. The evening concludes with the emotional journey of Gustav Mahler's Symphony No. 5. This performance was recorded at the Barbican Hall in London, UK, on May 15, 2022.

programme.title: David Bateson, Tuva Semmingsen, Cassandra Lemoine & Bjrn Fjstad
programme.sub-title: Fantasymphony A Concert of Fire and Magic
programme.desc: The Danish National Symphony Orchestra once again opens the gates to magical worlds with an enchanting concert program. Under the baton of German conductor Christian Schumann, the Danish National Symphony Orchestra, Danish National Concert Choir, and Danish National Junior Choir team up to perform music from the most popular fantasy movies, TV series and video games, including The Lord of The Rings, Game of Thrones, The Hobbit, The Witcher, and League of Legends. Featured soloists in this concert are Norwegian mezzo-soprano Tuva Semmingsen, Canadian-Portuguese soprano Cassandra Lemoine, Danish musician Bjrn Fjstad, and British actor David Bateson. This performance was recorded at the DR Koncerthuset in Copenhagen, Denmark, in April 2023.

programme.title: Elton John

programme.title: Lady Gaga
programme.desc: Lady Gaga's performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstar's first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura" "MANiCURE" "Artpop" "Jewels N' Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine" and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that she's "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix
programme.desc: This film chronicles the Jimi Hendrix Experience's storied visit to Maui, and how the band became ensnared with the ill-fated "Rainbow Bridge" movie. Never-before-released original footage, and new interviews with key players such as Billy Cox and director Chuck Wein, form this fascinating account about one of the most controversial independent films ever made. A Coda Cornerstone Collection.
